original: intros Q p q canon_p canon_q red. apply rep_minus_reduce in red as [p1 [q1 [red_p1 [red_q1 eq_pq]]]]. - exists p1. split. + auto. + eapply rep_plus_zero_reduce. * eauto. * auto. * eapply Rstar_0. eapply pluspf_minuspf_id; eauto. * auto. * auto. * eapply Rstar_0. eapply eqP_refl. * reflexivity. - auto. - auto.
